tweets.text:
Today is #LancashireDay 

To celebrate we are highlighting the Wyre Natural Flood Management project which presents a new collaborative approach to green finance

The project includes leaky dams, creation of bog & rewetting of peat on 70 hectares of the River Wyre catchment https://t.co/MjNItUlhXl

tweets.text:
Good work by our #Sale field team this week! 

They have been carrying out maintenance work on Glossop Brook to allow the river to keep flowing, free of blockages. 

This reduces #flood risk for the community https://t.co/Q0EsxuN3y0

TRENT TRANSFORMED
Aerial view of 1.5ha of new functional wet floodplain and over 500m of bifurcating channel  at Staffs Uni campus in Stoke
Even these massively degraded systems can be rejuvenated with vision 
@StaffsWildlife @SoTCityCouncil @EnvAgency @SalfordScience @StaffsUni https://t.co/rss99g49FK
A further example of the great work done by the @FishFarmEA which is based at Calverton #Notts https://t.co/vnKRgTaFYT

Waste crime is so much more than simply fly-tipping.

It's a serious form of criminal activity and we work around the clock to stop it.

Share this video to let others know and protect yourself against #WasteCrime. https://t.co/8jNvTNrWmu

Our #StaffsSUNRISE project manager @TalesofaWildGuy joined Matt and Madeleine from our partners @EnvAgencyMids to check out the progress that has been made on the new river channel @StaffsUni. The 450-metre channel will offer a much more diverse and dynamic habitat for wildlife. https://t.co/KzRh8LLF2S

tweets.text: The South West Pathfinder is raising awareness of the steps homeowners and businesses can take to #befloodready. Some great resources available and coming soon! @BeFloodReady @DefraWater @EnvAgencySW @EnvAgency @CornwallCouncil @DevonCC @CwllCFloodForum @DevComsTogether

We're getting excited about Session 2 of #FloodandCoast2020 and the presentation of the @EnvAgency's annual Flood and Coast Excellence awards. Hope to see you all at the ceremony! https://t.co/eTgQeSJfuA

Part of Rochdale Rd and Knowlwood Rd will be closed from 8pm tonight until 6am on Monday so @EnvAgencyYNE can carry out essential works.

Please plan your journey in advance as delays are likely. Diversions will be in place üëá https://t.co/NGxxnh3g9f

Good morning @EnvAgencyNW, it has been reported to us that one of your Knolls Bridge Flood Basin signs by the bridleway over @Go_CheshireWest land from Liverpool Road has been vandalised. FYI the claims made in the graffiti statement have not been fact checked. https://t.co/AWKBhmWoaf

We're demolishing Shade Chapel this weekend to reduce flood risk to Todmorden.

Part of Rochdale Rd & Knowlwood Rd will be closed from 8pm tonight until 6am on Monday so we can do this safely. Diversions will be in place. Please keep away from the site
https://t.co/kp3y70FTFJ https://t.co/blFAicAXTh

A spokesperson for @EnvAgency: ‚ÄúEvidence shows that the CURRENT levels of abstraction are having a detrimental effect on the rivers within the Cambridge area. ANY increase in abstraction will cause more pressure on water resources and FURTHER DETERIORATE the water environment."
Great to see the partnership #Water4Growth project with @EnvAgencySW and @WestcountryRT written up in the EA's #CurrentMagazine16  https://t.co/HoGtnfSLYH https://t.co/Cla1cePD88
It‚Äôs here ! My new album ‚ÄòMusic Played By Humans‚Äô is out NOW

tweets.text: @salford_mayor @Salford_Lewis @MikeMcCusker15 @SalfordVRangers Great news and tribute to leadership  of @EnvAgencyNW @EmmaHowardBoyd and @unitedutilities in improving our water quality in partnership with @GMGreenCity @RiversReturn @natural_course https://t.co/PYZzrgogqk

It's little things that make our collective efforts worthwhile.
Spur us on to achieve more.
An Otter in the Irwell at Adelphi in the centre of Salford
HOW AMAZING IS THAT
@salford_mayor @salforduni @SalfordVRangers @natural_course @EnvAgencyNW @MarkSewellUU @GroundworkGM https://t.co/zOfdnhY7DJ

The majority of Earth's chalk streams & rivers are found in England; fragile, extraordinary ecologies.
But they're dying from water company over-extraction, pollution & @EnvAgency inaction.
@Feargal_Sharkey is leading an event (8 Dec) on stopping the rot.
https://t.co/znRcXVS58x

Habitat creation underwayü¶° üè†
Along with @CGMLtd, we have undertaken works for the @EnvAgency to deliver artificial #badger setts in preparation for future #flood risk works in the east of England #biodiversity https://t.co/3vI3jJkXnT

"@EnvAgency has already owned up that the River Cam and its tributaries are in a declining state. They are in the process of being drained dry and the remains of them filled full of sewage."

tweets.text:
Perfect example of just how disjointed our system of regulation has become.

I know you need a fishing licence but old man gets ¬£641 fine while Anglian Water, in 2019, spent 133,045 hours dumping sewage into rivers in their service area and nothing happens. Really? @NorfolkPolice https://t.co/TQD2k4ytg6

We‚Äôre planning on replacing some major defences in my @EnvAgencyYNE patch.

Contractors are currently drilling 20 meters deep and taking ‚Äòcore‚Äô samples at @RotherValley.

Cores are then analysed by a geotechnical expert so we know the defence will be structurally sound. https://t.co/5kPkxKkNCy

We are delighted to have added two new talks to PiXL Stretch on microplastic pollution from the @EnvAgency.

At a time when this issue has never been more important to understand, we hope you might like to share these with students. 

Launch PiXL Stretch: https://t.co/B4XD9ImZiS https://t.co/mYzQYpUL9D
